testcase.name: Verify search comment functionality by name, email id
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed Then user clicks on Login button............................................passed And User is redirected to the dashboard.....................................passed Then User navigates to the comment section..................................passed When User clicks the search field...........................................passed And User enters the name"yash@gmail.com"....................................passed Then User clicks the search button..........................................passed
